entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:16 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 5:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

Dewpoint: -41.7°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
